eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Kentucky; Daviess; Fayette; Franklin; Madison; Ohio, KY; at 09:32 PM ON DEC 27, 2025 Effective until 09:47 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Emergency Alert System. This is only a test No action is needed. This is only a test.
